entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
This is my GitHub blog, and I'm not entirely sure what I'll put here yet. It will more than likely be a few short musings on the state of the industry, or views on some new technology I find, or just the coolest links of that day.

There likely won't be any drawn out huge articles or tutorials as I'll probably save those on JeremyMorgan.com.

I will however be talking about Github projects, including some of my own. I hope to meet new people through this awesome service, and hope to teach and be taught as well.
